ComicInfo.Summary:
As they travel across the globe on another mission, Subject 47 and his brother 6 begin to assemble their plan of attack against the Institute that made them who they are. A war on both their surrogate family of fellow subjects and a potential future spent as living weapons under someone else’s control. While Diana Burnwood’s new life in London has begun to blossom and her secret vendetta finds a new sponsor in the form of a crime boss all too eager to teach her new protégé a few tricks how to get her hands dirty.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jonathan Lau & Omi Remalante | 1 | B | Cover B | Gameplay | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Jonathan Lau | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Jonathan Lau & Omi Remalante | 4 | Note: The credits page for this issue includes a fifth cover, the cover is designated as cover A by Phillip Tan but no cover by Tan was solicited or published.
